channel.title: How do i use magic without runes?
channel.description: u want to change my server so i can use the spells without the runes they need, somebody know how to do it?

item.source: How do i use magic without runes?

item.title: How do i use magic without runes?
item.dc:creator: @cheese8 cheese8
item.description:
@cheese8 wrote:

just to explain it a little, where it says:

if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 20)==false)

this just means that if the player using the spell doesnt have the item ID 560, and 20 of them with them, they cant cast it.

now if you change the above to this:

if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 20)==true)

this means that if they do have what it says, it will cast it.

thats why you just get rid of it, it will tell the client that it doesnt need any items to be casted.[br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2007, 08:10:18 PM[/size][hr]yes.

to change the level reqiurment:

lets use wind strike again,

where it says:

if(playerLevel[6] >= 1)
the “playerLevel[6]” is refering to what skill. the “>=” means to cast it, you need level 1 or more magic.

now to change what level you need to cast it, change the “1” next to the: “>=”[br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2007, 08:12:56 PM[/size][hr]also, if u wanna change the exp you get when you cast it…

in wind strike where it says:

//PkingDelay = 15;
setAnimation(711);
addSkillXP((15*playerLevel[6]), 6);

the “15” in "addSkillXp((15*playerLevel[6]), 6);

change the 15.

the 15 means when you cast it, you get 15 magic exp… bla bla bla…

Read full topic

item.source: How do i use magic without runes?

item.title: How do i use magic without runes?
item.dc:creator: @cheese8 cheese8
item.description:
@cheese8 wrote:

go to your client.java, type “ctrl f” and seach for the name(s) of the spell(s) you want to change.
once you find it, somewhere in there should be something like this:

if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 20)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 30)==false))

just get rid of it.

also get rid of any “deleteItem(” you see.

heres an example if i were to do this:

i would go to wind strike.

if(magicID == 1152) // Wind strike
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 1)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(558, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 1)==false))
{
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(558, 1)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 1)==true))
{
//offsetY = (absY - EnemyY2) * -1;
//offsetX = (absX - EnemyX2) * -1;
//GraphicsHandler.addSpell(90, absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 160, 91, 43, 31, 92, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
hitDiff = 1 + misc.random(6);
inCombat();
stillgfx(92, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
//PkingDelay = 15;
setAnimation(711);
addSkillXP((15*playerLevel[6]), 6);
//sendMessage(“You Cast A Weak Wind Spell”);
deleteItem(558, getItemSlot(558), 1);
deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 1);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
//castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 1)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 1 to cast this spell.”);
}
}

ok, found wind strike. now i would remove what i dont need to get this:

if(magicID == 1152) // Wind strike
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 1)
{
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
{
//offsetY = (absY - EnemyY2) * -1;
//offsetX = (absX - EnemyX2) * -1;
//GraphicsHandler.addSpell(90, absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 160, 91, 43, 31, 92, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
hitDiff = 1 + misc.random(6);
inCombat();
stillgfx(92, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
//PkingDelay = 15;
setAnimation(711);
addSkillXP((15*playerLevel[6]), 6);
//sendMessage(“You Cast A Weak Wind Spell”);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
//castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}
else if(playerLevel[6] <= 1)
{
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 1 to cast this spell.”);
}
}

also get rid of anything that looks like this: sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);

any problems let me know.
